content-venturus-text: More than 30 projects delivered from different sectors of the industry such as manufacturing, human resources, quality and innovation. Main languages used: C#, NodeJs, ReactJS, SQL Server, Oracle, Python, NodeRED, C++ among others. The vast majority using unit and/or automated tests to ensure code quality requirements, Using tools necessary for delivery/organization such as: Git, Jira, Figma, SVN, Draw.IO, Postman, among others.
content-stefanini-text: Basic and advanced IT Instructor, specialized in tools from the Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and WEB. With classes of different ages, social classes, and technical levels, providing students with solid and practical knowledge with the ability to transmit complex concepts in an accessible way.
content-profile: Software developer with extensive experience in challenging projects. I worked in several programming languages, such as NodeJS, C# and Python, and in frameworks such as ReactJS, Angular and Sharepoint. I have experience in mentoring, having guided six professionals, in addition to having worked as a tech lead. I consider my most challenging project to be the integration of two Yaskawa robots, PLC, vision systems, stepper motors and pneumatics, with the aim of improving the ergonomics of a shipping team.
